Author Contributions E.B.L., T.Go., and N.K. acquired, compiled, interpreted, and analyzed the data, and wrote the manuscript with assistance from E.M.B.; T.Ga. and T.A.B. obtained funding, conceptualized and designed the study, and edited the manuscript; H.V. and P.G.S. generated and compiled the mitochondrial data; S.B. and T.Go. performed Western blots and densitometry analysis; E.P. processed the tissue; S.A.H., N.K., S.B., and G.L. performed the histologic analysis; and M.G.A. performed animal husbandry and provided administrative support.
